name: nagasai-creator-backend
description: Backend API for Naga sai LMS

scripts.migrate:new: node -e "const n=process.argv[1]||'change';const d=new Date().toISOString().replace(/[-:T]/g,'').slice(0,14);require('fs').writeFileSync('supabase/migrations/'+d+'_'+n+'.sql','-- Write your SQL here\n');console.log('Created: supabase/migrations/'+d+'_'+n+'.sql')"

author: Naga sai
